content: ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 18 work in pattern for 6 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 19 work in pattern for 4 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 20 work in pattern for 2 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one transition to the other side note if you are using an earlier version of this pattern the transition round has been re-worked to make it easier to work ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 21 work in pattern past the bor marker and then on 17 past the mid marker sw turn second side ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 22 work in pattern for 34 stitches sw turn ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 23 work in pattern for 33 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 24 work in pattern for 32 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 25 work in pattern for 31 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 26 work in pattern for 30 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 27 work in pattern for 28 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 28 work in pattern for 26 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 29 work in pattern for 24 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one hat #43 fish adult size v1 2 ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 30 work in pattern for 22 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1
